practiceAreas.expertise: Rhoxane Gros advises and represents clients on domestic and international litigation before the courts in Geneva, mainly in criminal and civil law matters.
Rhoxane Gros advises clients on asset protection and asset recovery in connection with fraud cases and ensures clients' rights by means of civil seizure of assets and criminal proceedings.
Rhoxane Gros further assists clients on corporate law matters and handles issues of corporate law including corporate housekeeping.

education.content: University of Fribourg, Bachelor of Law
University of Geneva, Master of Law
University of Geneva, Certificate of advanced Studies in Legal Profession
Admission to the Geneva Bar Exam (ranked 3rd best)
